text: [Music]
hi I'm amilcar with AWS migrating to the
cloud is a journey when you choose AWS
of the cloud platform you can continue
to efficiently leverage on-premises
solutions and architect applications
that support all your existing
environments with AWS you can simplify
the migration and management of
applications by integrating your own
premises environments with the AWS cloud
with the broadest and deepest set of
functionality of any cloud provider AWS
offers the most integrated networking
security and access controls as well as
storage and deployment management
capabilities to make your hybrid
architecture successful AWS makes it
easy to securely extend on-premises
infrastructure to the AWS cloud using
Amazon VPC we simplify the process of
establishing a dedicated network
connection from on-premises to AWS with
AWS direct connect and we make it easy
to integrate with on-premises Active
Directory by using AWS directory service
and AWS identity access management if
you're concerned about identity and
security you have common controls to
manage access to your nest adopting
cloud computing doesn't require a new
identity management strategy you can
create and manage AWS users groups and
use permission to allow and deny access
to AWS resources AWS also helps provide
single pane of glass management for both
Microsoft and VMware based environments
with system center and vcenter plugins
and we provide single tool sets to
manage and deploy applications that run
on premises on AWS or in hybrid
architecture with AWS opsworks AWS code
deploy and ec2 systems manager
[Music]
fufufufu
